data_structures: integer variables for total and result
algorithm_technique: hash map to store first occurrence of a prefix sum difference
finding the maximum distance between indices with the same prefix sum difference
problem_summary_simple: Find the widest range of indices where the sum of elements in two arrays are equal.
problem_summary_technical: Calculates prefix sum differences and uses a hash map to find the widest interval with equal prefix sum differences.
key_insights: The problem can be rephrased as finding the widest range [i, j] where prefix_sum1[j] - prefix_sum1[i-1] == prefix_sum2[j] - prefix_sum2[i-1].
A hash map is ideal for storing the first occurrence of each prefix sum difference to maximize the range.
